pre_caption: This stunning scenery shot is captured from the bow of a container ship sailing on the open ocean at night. The wide-angle view looks forward over stacks of shipping containers towards a breathtaking, star-filled sky, with the glow of a distant city visible on the horizon. The video is a timelapse, which captures the rotation of the stars.
